text: Rena Owen (born 22 July 1962 in Bay of Islands, Northland in New Zealand) is a New Zealand actress. She works in movies, television and theatre. She played Beth Heke in Once Were Warriors. She also played Anna in Ocean of Pearls (2007). The awards Owen has won include: * Montreal World Film Festival Winner (1994): Best Actress- Once Were Warriors * San Diego International Film Festival (1994): Best Actress- Once Were Warriors == References == Category:New Zealand television actors Category:New Zealand movie actors Category:1962 births Category:Living people
title: Rena Owen
